TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VocabularyItemDataConverter extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the converter class that converts values between different vocabulary items.

MemberSignature.Value: public static double ConvertToBaseUnits (Microsoft.Health.VocabularyItem vocabularyItem, double value);
.method public static hidebysig float64 ConvertToBaseUnits(class Microsoft.Health.VocabularyItem vocabularyItem, float64 value) cil managed

Docs.param: The vocabulary item of the data value to convert to base units.
The data value to convert to base units.
Docs.summary: Converts a value from the source vocabulary item units to the base units of the vocabulary.
Docs.returns: The converted data value in the base units for the vocabulary.
Docs.remarks: This method does not check the sign of the value. The caller is responsible for ensuring the input data value make sense for the input vocabulary item.
Docs.exception: The parameter does not support conversions to base units.
An unknown or unsupported conversion is encountered or an error occurs during the conversion to base units.
